issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Currently , diskBalancer report command "top" option takes values like "AAA" as well negative/decimal values and gives output. These invalid values should not be processed and some error/warning should be given.

For Example, 
$ hdfs diskbalancer -report -top -100
17/12/19 15:07:01 INFO command.Command: Processing report command
17/12/19 15:07:02 INFO balancer.KeyManager: Block token params received from NN: update interval=10hrs, 0sec, token lifetime=10hrs, 0sec
17/12/19 15:07:02 INFO block.BlockTokenSecretManager: Setting block keys
17/12/19 15:07:02 INFO balancer.KeyManager: Update block keys every 2hrs, 30mins, 0sec
17/12/19 15:07:02 INFO command.Command: Reporting top -100 DataNode(s) benefiting from running DiskBalancer.
Processing report command
Reporting top -100 DataNode(s) benefiting from running DiskBalancer.
fields.summary: DiskBalancer report command top option should only take positive numeric values

comments.body:
Patch v1 handles the case where if the top limit specified for report command is not valid, it throws an exception.

[~anu], please have a look.
